Node.definition: = action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans initiate a possible argument or conflict with other humans or with a deity by accusing them of wrongdoing or by taking action in a different way
= deity; ◄ of Israel; traditionally: Almighty One; better: All sufficient One (= the One every good and perfect gift comes from); ≈ another name for Israel's God

meaning unsure; possibly: = a person who responds to allegedly negative behavior of others in the form of an accusation or a verbal rebuke|meaning unsure; possibly: = a person who deserves to be punished
= action by which humans or deities express their disapproval of something with words
= the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

Node.gloss: to be worthless|to be insignificant|to be of no account
Node.definition: = state in which humans have a reduced value or reduced importance, mostly in the eyes of someone else

= a reference to an unknown object or event; normally used with the purpose of identifying that object; sometimes used in rhetorical questions expressing one's conviction that that object or event cannot be identified
literally: to bring back; hence: = action by which humans or deities respond to (other) humans or deities in a direct conversation
literally: to lay (one's) hand on (one's) mouth; hence: = action by which humans purposefully refrain from speaking up
literally: to put (one's) hand on (one's) mouth; hence: = action by which humans intentionally refrain from speaking
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted
= state in which a countable entity is one in number

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= state in which a countable entity is two in number
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
= action in which humans or deities respond to a question or situation, either by words or by actions
= deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

marker identifying the entity that is directly targeted by the event in focus, and which usually is already part of the cognitive context; described in syntactic terms as the direct object marker; untranslatable in English unless accompanied by a suffix
= man; ◄ from the land of Uz (עוּץ) ► main character of book of Job
= process by which a strong wind blows, ► causing danger and destruction and inspiring fear; ≈ often associated with the appearance and intervention of God

Node.gloss: to say|to speak|to tell|to command|to think|to call
Node.definition: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

= to tie a belt or girdle around one's waist; ≈ often used metaphorically to denote arming oneself for battle, or, in a more abstract sense, to put on certain characteristics and qualities, such as strength, courage, and aggression
= a male human
= area located on both sides of spine between false ribs and hip bone; ◄ part of human body; ≈ often used to indicate the entire waist region of the body; euphemism for male genitals

Node.gloss: to make known|to show|to inform|to tell|to teach
Node.definition: = causative process by which humans or deities cause (other) humans to acquire information about (other) humans, deities, or certain facts, which is stored in the mind
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
marker affirming or questioning the truth value of the information that follows
= a situation where one party has a dispute with another party, and is looking for a legal ruling in which they receive what they consider to be rightfully theirs

Node.gloss: to declare guilty|to condemn as guilty
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities declare (other) humans guilty before God or humanity, ◄ as a result of (allegedly) having acted in a way that is contrary to the law

Node.gloss: to prove to be righteous|to be just|to be in the right|to be innocent
Node.definition: = state or process by which humans and deities are found to conform to an accepted code of behavior

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical
= each of the two upper limbs of the body, including the shoulder and extending until the hand; ≈ directly associated with strength and power
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= state in which humans or deities have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= state in which humans have an elevated status, either in their own eyes or in the eyes of other people, ≈ which can either be good or bad, depending on whether this status is justified
= state in which humans, deities, animals and plants are respected by others, implying beauty, vigor and authority
= state in which deities, humans, or animals have personal greatness and a high status, recognized and respected by others
literally: to clothe oneself; hence: = action by which humans are deities engage themselves in a certain activity
= state of extreme displeasure; ≈ often associated with fire and smoke

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans

= process or action by which living creatures perceive something, primarily though not necessarily exclusively with their eyes, either as a spontaneous incident or as the result of focusing the eyes on something
= state in which humans have an elevated status in their own eyes, ≈ which is seen as a negative and undesirable attitude for humans
= causative process by which deities cause humans to have a lower estimate of their own importance, usually through punishment
= causative action by which someone causes someone else to fall down through an act of violence; ≈ possibly associated with humiliation
= causative action by which humans cause other humans or objects to be invisible so that their location cannot be determined, which is often achieved by burying them or by covering them
= the loose natural substance of the earth's surface
= state in which humans or objects are jointly involved in an event

Node.gloss: to wrap|to bandage|to tie|to bind up
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans wrap something around an inanimate object
= place where objects are no longer visible

Node.gloss: also|too|even|moreover|what is more|what is worse|furthermore|besides|both … and
Node.definition: marker pointing to information that needs to be considered in addition to previous information (either explicit or implied)
= referent to the speaker or writer in a discourse
= action by which humans openly express recognition of what someone else has done or achieved
= action by which humans or deities help themselves in a (difficult) situation
= the side of the human body which is to the south when facing the direction of the rising sun
= a large wild animal, sometimes identified with the hippopotamus but more likely to denote the elephant or a mythical monster
= a linker introducing a proposition that gives additional information regarding an explicit or implicit object, location, time, or manner
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them
= type of grass; ◄ plants; ► serves as food for animals; ≈ regarded as weak, vulnerable, and short lived

= large ruminant animals with horns and cloven hoofs, ► chiefly domesticated for meat or milk, as beasts of burden, or for pulling a cart or a plow; it is a clean animal and can be eaten and sacrificed; ≈ regarded as a sign of wealth
= action by which someone consumes food; with or without explicit object
= state in which humans, animals or deities have the ability to perform actions, or to prevail in, or endure situations that require the exertion or mustering of effort or force

= the two sides of the body of humans and certain animals between the rib cage and the hips, ► which is the place where people normally tie a girdle, breeches, loincloth, or sackcloth; ≈ a symbol of strength
= state of being physically strong and healthy which usually includes the ability of producing children
= front part of the human trunk below the ribs, containing the stomach, bowels, and reproductive organs; ≈ associated with birth, food, speech, and the innermost part of objects
= causative action by which an animal keeps part of its body stiff or erect
= the hindmost part of an animal's body, extending from the backbone; ≈ sometimes associated with insignificance, especially when compared to the head

= evergreen tree growing up to 40 m tall, with a trunk up to 2.5 m in diameter; as it grows older its branches spread out more and more horizontally; grows in elevated places; ◄ Cedrus libani; ► highly appreciated building material; also used in cleaning ritual; ≈ associated with beauty, quality, pride, and strength
= a piece of tough fibrous connecting tissue uniting muscles to bones ► and so forming the inner framework of the body
= the upper part of the leg of an animal, above the knee
= state in which cord like objected are twined together, resulting in additional strength
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish material that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
exact meaning unsure; probably: = long, slender object
= a yellowish brown alloy of copper with up to one third tin, ≈ regarded as a hard and difficult to bend
= any of the pieces of hard, whitish tissue that together consitute the skeleton of humans and animals; ≈ associated with strength
= a long, rigid piece of metal
= a strong, hard magnetic silvery grey metal, ► used in construction and manufacturing; ≈ associated with strength and permanence
= referent to a male person or another object that is considered masculine
= state in which an object is of a relatively high quality
literally: road; hence: = a journey made for a specific purpose, usually on someone else’s behalf
with singular meaning: = the highest God, creator of heaven and earth
= causative action by which human or deities produce an object, either personally or by others on behalf of them

Node.gloss: to bring close|to bring near|to present|to offer
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans cause (other) humans, animals and objects to move to a location closer to a point of reference
= action by which humans are engaged in an armed conflict with other humans, accompanied by deeds of aggression
exact meaning discussed; = a portion of some part of nature, which is understood as having produced it; the final shape is instrumental for people and animals in some contexts
= a relatively high elevation of the earth’s surface; generally higher than a hill (גִּבְעָה)
literally: to hold, carry; hence: = process by which plants or trees (or the area where they grow) produces branches or fruit
possibly shortened form of נֶפֶשׁ חַיָּה living creature: = animal; ◄ generic, sometimes referring to all animals, sometimes limited to wild land animals only

= a piece of land generally uninhabited by human beings, but where one can find wild animals and plants and trees; consists of grasslands, fields, desert, or forest; can be used for farming, pasturing animals, and hunting; often used in contrast to inhabited land such as cities or encampments.
= action by which humans engage in activities associated with joy and contentment by leaping, dancing, celebrating, and even engaging in games
= thorny plants of about 1.5 meter high, bearing small, yellow fruit; ◄ |iZyziphus lotus|i*, found in the northern part of the Jordan Valley and in Samaria

= state or action by which a human being or animal is in or assumes a horizontal position; ► in order to rest, sleep, or have sex with someone, or because of being unable to stand up as a result of weakness or death; ≈ sometimes associated with security
= state in which people, animals, or objects are in a location where they cannot be readily seen or where danger cannot reach them

= a tall grass with stiff, sharply pointed leaves and a plume like flower head that reaches to more than 2 m; it grows in lakes and streams, the roots creeping across the bottom of the lake to produce new leaves and stalks; or on riverbanks; ◄ Phragmites australis (Common reed) or Arundo donax (Giant reed); ► used for baskets, mats, flutes, pens, arrows, and roof coverings; ≈ symbol of weakness and undependability, but also flexibility
= an area of low lying land which is flooded in wet seasons or at high tide, and typically remains waterlogged at all times; a place where reeds (קָנֶה) and papyrus (גֹּמֶא) grow
= thorny plants of about 1.5 meter high, bearing small, yellow fruit; ◄ |iZyziphus lotus|i*, found in the northern part of the Jordan Valley and in Samaria
literally: to go around; hence: = state in which objects are located all around a person or animal
= a relatively steep and narrow valley following the course of a stream, which is often dry, except for the rainy season
= large body of flowing water; ◄ located in Palestine ≈ which the Israelites had to cross to enter the Promised Land
= process by which humans or animals are overcome by a sudden uncontrollable fear or anxiety resulting in a frenzied hurry to run away

Node.gloss: to be confident|to be unsuspecting|to be secure
Node.definition: = state in which humans live with confidence and without fear; ≈ often regarded as carelessness, especially when there is no mention of trust in YHWH

Node.gloss: to flow with force|to rush|to gush
Node.definition: = process by which a substance moves with force
= river; ◄ flowing from Mount Hermon (חֶרְמֹון) in a southerly direction through the Sea of Galilee (כִּנֶּרֶת) into the Dead Sea (יָם־הַמֶּלַח)
= an opening in the lower part of the face of humans and animals through which food and air are taken and vocal sounds are emitted

= one of two parts of the body of humans and animals that is used to see things, after which the observed information is stored and processed in the mind; sparkling when the body is healthy and strong, but dim when weak or sick; the eyes also play a significant role in determining whether a person is considered beautiful or not; eyes can reflect both an attitude of compassion and a sentiment of malice; ≈ high eyes are associated with pride, whereas lowly eyes are connected with humility; a good eye is associated with generosity, whereas an evil eye denotes stinginess; winking the eye is associated with underhanded practices
= contraption; ► used for catching animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which humans use a sharp object to make a hole through an object
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils
= causative action by which humans or animals move an object from one location to another, usually with some effort or difficulty
= large mythical monster living in the sea and looking like a giant croccodile or similar reptile
= wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; ► thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them

= piece of stout cord; ◄ made by twisting together palm fibres, linen, or reeds; ► used for tying and keeping things together, climbing, measuring, drawing things to oneself, making traps, etc.; ≈ often used in a figurative sense to refer to conditions that try to take control of people; a rope tied around the head is a symbol of submission
= the fleshy organ in the mouth, used for tasting, licking, swallowing, and (in the case of humans) speaking
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
= a fairly thick cord formed by twisting or braiding several strands together; ◄ probably made out of rush fibers; ► used by hunters
= part of the body projecting above the mouth on the face of a person or animal, containing the two nostrils

= small, curved piece of metal or bone or even a strong thorn, with a sharp point on one end, usually with a barb just behind the point, and a loop or bend on the other end to which a line can be attached; ► used to catch and control animals; ≈ associated with aggression and control
= causative action by which humans use a sharp object to make a hole through an object
jaw, cheek
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= to try to win a favorable attitude from someone else; ◄ by approaching that person in a very humble way

= particle linking two events and denoting that X takes places in order to establish whether Y is true or not; X is often elided, which turns the remainder of the phrase into a question, which is often rhetorical

= action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually not directly followed by the actual words that are spoken
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation

Node.gloss: to make a covenant|to make a treaty
Node.definition: literally: to cut (a covenant); hence: = action by which two or more parties make a solemn agreement, accompanied by stipulations, blessings, and curses
= a solemn agreement between two or more parties (persons, groups, nations, deities) with stipulations, blessings, and curses

= man who is under the authority of someone else as that person's legal property, employee, subject, or vassal; or someone who presents himself as such when speaking to someone of importance or praying to God
= a long duration of time that is or may seem unending, whether in the past or in the future
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= action by which humans engage in activities associated with joy and contentment by leaping, dancing, celebrating, and even engaging in games
= generic term for a small bird; ► usually clean and can therefore be eaten
= causative action by which humans tie (part of) the body of an animal with a rope or cord ► in order to keep it under control
= action by which a potential buyer and seller negotiate about the price
= person that belongs to a group or class of people
= causative action by which humans divide an object or a set of objects into two or more parts
= a relationship linking two or more individuals or groups
= a person engaging in commerce and trade
marker denoting that the truth value of the following statement is under investigation
= causative action by which someone causes a certain location, container, or surface to be filled or covered with so many objects that little or no space is left
= wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; ► thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them
= the thin layer of tissue forming the natural outer covering of the body of a person or animal
= wooden rod about the length of a man, with a metal or bone point with barbs on one end, and a rope on the other end; ► thrown at fish or aquatic animals to kill and catch them
= thrusting or hurling weapon, consisting of a long shaft with a sharp point; ► used primarily for fishing

= upper part of the human body, or the front or upper part of the body of an animal, typically separated from the rest of the body by a neck, and containing the brain, mouth, and sense organs; ≈ associated with the entire person, that person's life, and that person's responsibilities

Node.gloss: to place|to put|to lay|to set|to keep
Node.definition: = causative action by which humans or deities cause objects or (other) humans to be located in a certain place
literally: to lay (one's) palms (on something); hence: = to touch an animate object with the intention of catching or harming it

Node.gloss: to remember|to call to mind|to be mindful|to bear in mind|to consider
Node.definition: = action by which humans or deities reprocess information that is stored in their mind
= armed conflict between different countries or different groups within a country
= process by which an action is repeated or continued
